review_data.title: Best Bar in Town! Schöne Menschen,
review_data.content: Best Bar in Town! Schöne Menschen, fancy Cocktails, gute Musik, Terasse mit Abendsonne, freundliches Personal.

review_data.title: Gut für ein paar Drinks
review_data.content: Eine nicht allzu große Bar mit guter Atmosphäre und Musik. Nichts besonderes, aber für ein paar Drinks absolut ok :)

review_data.title: It’s ok
review_data.content: I guess it was ok... Drinks were good, the music wasn’t so great! It was really crowded and we didn’t enjoyed as much as we could. Friendly staff tho!

review_data.title: Bar divertido, pedacinho do Brasil em Zurique
review_data.content: Bar divertido, pedacinho do Brasil em Zurique! me diverti muito, variedade de drinks! Ótima localização, fui de tram até lá,...More

review_data.title: schöne Terasse, "spezieller" Service
review_data.content: Im Vagabundo kann man gutes Bier und spezielle Drinks auf einer grossen Sonnenterasse geniessen. Leider sind die Männer im Service...More

review_data.title: fun place
review_data.content: went here for a couple of drinks and a chat. perfect place for this .. friendly barkeeper, relaxed atmosphere, fun place. will come back for sure

review_data.title: Best drinks in Zurich
review_data.content: At last, a good place in Zurich to have good drinks in city, listen music and share time with friends.... Very interesting...

review_data.title: Szenenlokal mit schöner Terasse
review_data.content: Ich war letztens im Vagabundo und trank auf der grossen sonnigen Terassse einen sehr guten Ingwer-Tee. Die Bedienung war freundlich....More

review_data.title: A new bar on Badenerstrasse
review_data.content: .This recently opened space has a very welcoming atmosphere. There is lounge music playing in the background and the space consists of wooden tables and chairs, sofas, a circular seating area around a column, a long bar with stools, foot lockers and dark curtains.
